name: Inferno Blaze
description: Inferno Blaze is a fiery concoction designed for thrill-seekers and spice lovers alike. Crafted from a blend of ghost peppers, habaneros, and a hint of smoked paprika, this hot sauce delivers a bold heat that's balanced by a touch of sweetness from ripe mango and a trace of tangy lime. Perfect for those who dare to amp up their culinary creations, Inferno Blaze will ignite your dishes with its vibrant flavor profile and intense heat. Bottled in small batches to ensure peak freshness and flavor, it's the ultimate addition to your spice collection.
